title: Germany v England LIVE: Team news, analysis and build up to tonight's big friendly
text: Germany v England LIVE: Team news, analysis and build up to tonight's big friendly ENGLAND take on Germany in Dortmund tonight in Gareth Southgate's first game as full-time manager - follow it live here. PUBLISHED: 17:49,   17:58, Wed, Mar 22, 2017 England face Germany tonight with kick off at 7.45 Gareth Southgate takes charge of his first match since being named full England boss
